tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage
type: Tutorial Step - Let's Take a Closer Look!

definition.text: We're going to take a few minutes to unpack everything we see on the chart so that you may fully understand how this works!

paragraphs.text: The fact that the strategy is triggering and closing five times in a row in five consecutive candles must mean the following:
The Trigger On Event validates true on each of these candles.
The Take Position Event also validates true on each of these candles!
This also means that the strategy is triggering and taking the position on the same candle! Let's go and verify if all this is true!
